turkish_example_sentence: Sen küçük kardeşinin elini kalabalık meydanda sıkıca tutmuş olsaydın, kaybolmazdı
english_example_sentence: If you had kept your little brother's hand tightly in the crowded square, he wouldn't have gotten lost
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты держал руку своего младшего брата крепко на людной площади, он бы не потерялся
